title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for the correct implicit differentiation

< -1 > each incorrect derivative of a term

2 x + x y ′ + y + 2 y y ′ = 0

1 point is earned for correctly solving for y'

0/1 if only one y'
